message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at $12000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking to save a bit on the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $11000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9500?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go below $11000. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $10500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10000?
